ssot__ShoppingCartEngagement__dlm.name: Shopping Cart Engagement
ssot__ShoppingCartEngagement__dlm.description: The Shopping Cart Engagement DMO represents data captured from user actions, such as adding and removing items from a shopping cart.

ssot__AccountContactId__c.description: A reference ID to account contact.

ssot__ActionCadenceStepId__c.description: A reference ID to action cadence step.

ssot__AdjustedTotalProductAmount__c.description: The total product amount after any adjustments.

ssot__CaseId__c.description: A reference ID to a recorded issue, for example laptop connectivity.

ssot__ContactPointId__c.description: A reference ID to the accounts’ contact point, for example physical address, email address, or phone number.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The date the record was created.

ssot__CurrencyId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of currency used.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name referring to the source of records also identified as the external source ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__DeviceCountryId__c.description: A reference ID to the country where the device is located.

ssot__DeviceIPAddress__c.description: The IP address of the device.

ssot__DeviceLatitude__c.description: The Geo latitude of the device when engagement was recorded.

ssot__DeviceLocaleId__c.description: A reference ID to the user locale configured on the device.

ssot__DeviceLongitude__c.description: The Geo longitude of device when engagement was recorded.

ssot__DevicePostalCode__c.description: The postal code associated with the device.

ssot__EngagementAssetId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement asset.

ssot__EngagementChannelId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementChannelActionId__c.description: A reference ID to the action taken in the engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementChannelTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement channel.

ssot__EngagementDateTm__c.description: The date and time of engagement. Since the engagement happens after send, the engagement date must be after the Send Date Time.

ssot__EngagementEventDirectionId__c.description: A reference ID to the engagement event direction, such as inbound or outbound.

ssot__EngagementNotesTxt__c.description: The details and notes about the engagement.

ssot__EngagementPublicationId__c.description: A reference ID to a background process that generates volumes of email messages, SMS messages, or other Engagement Vehicle types.

ssot__EngagementTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of engagement, for example email or phone.

ssot__EngagementVehicleId__c.description: A reference ID to the vehicle where the engagement was recorded.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to system that External Record Id was assigned.

ssot__IndividualId__c.description: A reference ID to a contact for the account.

ssot__InternalEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID to an engagement actor that groups the different types of individuals targeted for marketing engagements, for example leads and account contacts.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__IsGiftOrder__c.description: A flag to indicate if the order is a gift.

ssot__IsTestSend__c.description: A flag to indicate if an engagement record was generated as part of testing.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__LeadlId__c.description: A reference ID to a person or company that showed interest in products.

ssot__LinkURL__c.description: A link to the web page accessed during the engagement.

ssot__MarketAudienceId__c.description: A reference ID to the intended audience that engagement was designed to reach.

ssot__MarketJourneyActivityId__c.description: A reference ID to a step or activity that a customer configures in Salesforce Journey Builder tool for marketing associated with engagement.

ssot__MarketSegmentId__c.description: A reference ID to a group of people who share one or more common characteristics, and are grouped for marketing associated with engagement.

ssot__MarketingEmailListId__c.description: A reference ID to the marketing email list used for the engagement.

ssot__ProductId__c.description: A reference ID to a product intended to be sold, for example goods, services, bundles, or made-to-order products.

ssot__ProductBrandName__c.description: The brand of a product, for example Northern Trail Outfitters.

ssot__ProductCategoryName__c.description: The class of products, such as shoes or hats.

ssot__ProductColorName__c.description: The color variant of a product displayed on the search result.

ssot__ProductDisplayPositionNumber__c.description: The position number where the product is displayed.

ssot__ProductDisplayPosition__c.description: The numeric position of the product in the displayed list.

ssot__ProductImageURL__c.description: A link to the page that hosts the product photo or image.

ssot__ProductPriceAmount__c.description: The price of the product displayed on the search result.

ssot__ProductQuantity__c.description: The product package quantity that is displayed on the search result.

ssot__ProductStyleName__c.description: The product style displayed on the search result.

ssot__ProductViewURL__c.description: A link to the detail page about the product displayed on the search result.

ssot__PromotionCouponId__c.description: A reference ID to payment in the form of a voucher entitling the holder to a discount on a particular product.

ssot__ReferrerURL__c.description: The URL of an application that directed the user to the software application that generated engagement.

ssot__SalesOrderId__c.description: An internal document generated by the seller indicating that the customer is ready to purchase products and services.

ssot__SentDateTm__c.description: The date and time of send.

ssot__SessionId__c.description: A reference ID to a session used to group related events together.

ssot__ShoppingCartId__c.description: A reference ID to the shopping cart for data captured from user actions, for example adding or removing items from the shopping cart.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the Shopping Cart Engagement DMO.

ssot__ShoppingCartEventTypeId__c.description: A reference ID to the type of shopping cart interaction.

ssot__TargetEngagementActorId__c.description: A reference ID to an engagement actor that groups different types of individuals targeted for marketing associated with engagement, for example leads and account contacts.

ssot__TaskId__c.description: A reference ID to business activity, for example making a phone call. In the user interface, tasks and event records are collectively referred to as activities.

ssot__TotalAdjustmentAmount__c.description: The total amount after any adjustments.

ssot__TotalDeliveryAmount__c.description: The total amount of delivery costs.

ssot__TotalProductQuantity__c.description: The total number of a product.

ssot__TotalProductTaxAmount__c.description: The total tax amount of the product.

ssot__WebCookieId__c.description: A reference ID to a small piece of data sent from a website and stored on the user's computer by the user's web browser while the user is browsing.

ssot__WorkflowId__c.description: A reference ID to the sequence of steps or processes from initiation to completion.
